string.name: name
string.value: The Mystery of the White Portion
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he may be able to reveal the white portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k has asked you to bring him #rInk#k (a drop item from #rOctopuses#k) in order to uncover the mystery of the Treasure Map. He says there is a hidden portal that will take you to a location filled with #rOctopuses#k near the yellow barricade in #b#m103010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k upon completion.

The #rDirty Treasure Map#k is covered in Green, Red, and White.

Green was removed from the map using the Slime Eraser.
Red was vaporized by the Flint, and the curse of the animal's blood was released using Ayan Mercury's Microphone.
White, after being sprayed with the special Ink, quickly revealed the map.

The map has finally been completed!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,500 #Wbasic# #i4032489:# #t4032489:# #c4032489# 1 Able to proceed to 'The Completed Treasure Map' as next quest.
Looking at your map, I see you've uncovered the secrets behind the green and red portions of the map.\nYou seem to have only the white remaining. Am I correct? Ha! This mission seems way too easy.

Of course, it's only if I'm not mistaken, that is. But this map, the more I look at it, is poorly drawn!\n\nAnyway, you must bring me some items in order for me to uncover the last secret of this map.

If you go to #b#m103010000##k, you will see a yellow barricade where you will find portals that will lead you to different places. They're called Hidden Streets, and they're all over Maple World, so keep a close eye on them.

If you go there, you'll find a lot of #rOctopuses#k. Can you hunt them and collect 20 sacks of #rInk#k? Stop asking questions--just do as I Say! You don't have to go to the exact place I mentioned. It's just a suggestion as to where you can find a lot of Octopuses.
Weren't YOU the one that was curious?
Ah, you've finished collecting the #rInk#k.\n\nLet me make you what you need. It will only take a few seconds.
I can tell you now.\n\nI'm not removing the white, but I'm spraying black to trace the lines to make out what's hiding underneath.
Open the #rDirty Treasure Map#k and drag the #rInc Sack#k over it.\n\nCome back and see me when the map is complete.
